description.description: -Online platform for taching language through various TV shows and their subtitles -Users are able to learn important vocabulary words and phrases chosen with NLP for each episode before watching the episode. -Each word and phrase has an audio associated so that users can learn the correct pronunciation. -There is also a quiz component where you can test your understanding before watching the show. -Worked on the backend with Node and Express. -Devpost here.

-Website for Japanese Student Association displaying general information, upcoming events, and how to get involved.
-Functionality of adding members to website.
-Developed with Python with flask and PostgreSQL
